patthana23.20:1.1: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana23.20:2.1: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana23.20:3.1: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve. (Cattāri gaṇitakena dve dve pañhā kātabbā. Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana23.20:5.1: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana23.20:7.1: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto naabyākato dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana23.20:8.1: Ārammaṇe cuddasa, adhipatiyā dvādasa, anantare terasa, upanissaye ekavīsa, kamme sattarasa, natthiyā vigate terasa.
